overview: June a young orphan is befriended by Perry Boscam when he shares his lunch with her on the road to Rising Sun to take over his father's saw mill.  The soon fall in love and marry only to find out that a women in Perry's past has come to town to make trouble.  Teaming up with the local political bully they set out to make Perry's life miserable.. but June sticks by her husband to the end.
title: Blue Jeans
